column1: Smoque BBQ////It was really hard to discern the better of the two
column2: but the baby back just slightly edged out the STL ribs. Both were outstanding. Just as a note
column3: my husband liked these second best for the crawl
column4: as he said they tasted a bit of liquid smoke. Apparently
column6: or I'm totally ok with that. Either way
column7: I'm so happy I know where I am getting ribs from now on. The sides were just ok for us
column8: tho I did really like those BBQ beans
column9: and my 2 bites of the cobbler. But this was most definitely all about the meat
